caption.p: Comparison of the change in ecosystem gross primary production (ΔGPP eco; gC m −1 year −1) among six temperature change sensitivity tests by IAP‐DGVM and CLM4‐CNDV, respectively. The boxplots denote the 10th, 25th, median, 75th, and 90th percentiles, and the red star line is the global area‐averaged ΔGPP eco
